title.rendered: “Remembering IDF Heroes: Details and Updates on Recent Casualties and Injured Soldiers”

content.rendered:
The attached message is from an IDF spokesperson about the names of two IDF casualties whose families have been informed: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC0712202353.2

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where detailed information and pictures of the fallen soldiers are published and updated: https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, in the battle in which Staff Sgt. Amit Bonsel was killed, three reserve paratroopers were severely injured. Another reservist from Battalion 7008 was severely injured in a battle in the north of the Gaza Strip.
The soldiers were evacuated for medical treatment in the hospital, their families have been updated.
